Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to capital improvement costs pursuant to which a manufactured home park may increase rent above three percent
Summary: Defines the types of capital improvement costs pursuant to which a manufactured home park may increase rent above three percent over the previous rent price.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to capital improvement costs pursuant to which a manufactured home park may increase rent above three percent
